channel.title: Can some one explain
channel.description:
can some one explain to me what "public boolean multiCombat() {" means and how to add multi combat into server ( im useing delta base
thanx james :)

item.title: Can some one explain
item.dc:creator: @jamespk jamespk
item.description:
@jamespk wrote:






its the xxxx >= coords && xxxxcords          for both x and y it gose lowest cord first then highest i.e        [code]
if((absX >= 3144 && absX <= 3184 && absY >= 3519 && absY <=3656)[/code]  if you look you can tell it gose [code]absX >= 3144[/code] witch is lower than [code]absX <= 3184 [/code] and its the same for the Y cords . et me know if you understand or if i nee to explain more










mod please close this :)

its the xxxx >= coords && xxxxcords for both x and y it gose lowest cord first then highest i.e if((absX >= 3144 && absX <= 3184 && absY >= 3519 && absY <=3656) if you look you can tell it gose absX >= 3144 witch is lower than absX <= 3184 and its the same for the Y cords . et me know if you understand or if i nee to explain more

item.title: Can some one explain
item.dc:creator: @jamespk jamespk
item.description:
@jamespk wrote:

thanx btw i found it out and also it need sot be [quote=“Uncalled, post:2, topic:395218”][code=java]
public boolean multiCombat() {
if((lowest xcords >= coords && highest xcords <= coords && lowest ycords >= coords && highest ycords <=coords))

return true;
else
return false;
}[/code][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Can some one explain
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

public boolean multiCombat() {
Is the code snippet that allows multi-pvp on your server. If you’d like to add this, just below all those coordinates, simply add the coordinates that you would like to add into your server. For an example:

[code=java]
public boolean multiCombat() {
if((absX >= coords && absX <= coords && absY >= coords && absY <=coords))

return true;
else
return false;
}[/code]

Read full topic
